ygData.subject: Bard runs
ygData.msgSnippet: There is also a bard in Ak Anon who asks you to deliver a letter to Kelethin. Haven t had the chance to finish it yet, as I found her very late last night,
ygData.messageBody:
There is also a bard in Ak'Anon who asks you to deliver a letter to
Kelethin. Haven't had the chance to finish it yet, as I found her very
late last night, then went to sleep. May get a chance to try it
tonight, if I play. If not, then in two weeks after vacation.

Oh, that is going to be a long long two weeks without EQ. But, I made
13 last night! Woohoo!

Mandibal
Bard from Qeynos
Cazic-Thule
